data.text:
In this vast universe――there exist inexplicable lifeforms. 
Lifeforms that we cannot perceive.
data.name: Narration
data.processed:
󠁿In this vast universe――there exist inexplicable lifeforms. 
󠁿Lifeforms that we cannot perceive.

data.text:
『Aliens』 and multi-dimensional organisms inhabiting an 『Astral Body』. 
Someday, one such existence may decide to descend upon this planet.
data.name: Narration
data.processed:
󠁿『Aliens』 and multi-dimensional organisms inhabiting an 『Astral Body』. 
󠁿Someday, one such existence may decide to descend upon this planet.

data.text:
――Tracen Academy at night. I had some business to attend to…… 
but then I heard a sound from overhead.
data.processed:
󠁿――Tracen Academy at night. I had some business to attend to…… 
󠁿but then I heard a sound from overhead.

data.text:
If something had happened with the HVAC system, 
it'd be a big problem. I borrowed a key from the night 
staff and hurried to the roof to see what happened.
data.processed:
󠁿If something had happened with the HVAC system, 
󠁿it'd be a big problem. I borrowed a key from the night 
󠁿staff and hurried to the roof to see what happened.

data.text: And, there on the roof――
data.processed: 󠁿And, there on the roof――

data.text:
Was a girl I didn't recognize. Those were Uma Musume ears. 
But……the shape seemed a little off.
data.processed:
󠁿Was a girl I didn't recognize. Those were Uma Musume ears. 
󠁿But……the shape seemed a little off.

data.text:
No matter who it was, even an Uma Musume couldn't jump to the 
roof of a locked school building. Just who was this girl……?
data.processed:
󠁿No matter who it was, even an Uma Musume couldn't jump to the 
󠁿roof of a locked school building. Just who was this girl……?

data.text:
My voice was shaky out of fear. 
Would my words……even get through to her?
data.processed:
󠁿My voice was shaky out of fear. 
󠁿Would my words……even get through to her?

data.text: …………"Communication"
data.processed: 󠁿…………"Communication"

data.text:
"Communication" with Neo Universe……would you like to try it? 
That is, if……you're "INTI" it.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿"Communication" with Neo Universe……would you like to try it? 
󠁿That is, if……you're "INTI" it.

data.text:
Neo Universe……was that this girl's name? 
I felt like I could somewhat understand her words.
data.processed:
󠁿Neo Universe……was that this girl's name? 
󠁿I felt like I could somewhat understand her words.

data.text:
Was she an Uma Musume, or some mysterious lifeform 
shaped like an Uma Musume……? Either way, it seemed 
like we were on the same wavelength. In that case……
data.processed:
󠁿Was she an Uma Musume, or some mysterious lifeform 
󠁿shaped like an Uma Musume……? Either way, it seemed 
󠁿like we were on the same wavelength. In that case……

data.text: "Discontinuity"……I was trying to repair it.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: 󠁿"Discontinuity"……I was trying to repair it.

data.text:
Because the scale that rang out……was one of my 『Favorites』. 
When it resonates within, it puts me at 『Peace』.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿Because the scale that rang out……was one of my 『Favorites』. 
󠁿When it resonates within, it puts me at 『Peace』.

data.text:
――Repair the discontinuity. I didn't know what that meant, 
and I don't know what would happen after that. But……
data.processed:
󠁿――Repair the discontinuity. I didn't know what that meant, 
󠁿and I don't know what would happen after that. But……

data.text:
The girl herself didn't seem to 
be harmful to those around her.
data.processed:
󠁿The girl herself didn't seem to 
󠁿be harmful to those around her.

data.text:
Your alignment is……"Educator". 
『Trainer』……is what you're called?
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿Your alignment is……"Educator". 
󠁿『Trainer』……is what you're called?

data.text:
I don't have an Uma Musume that I'm responsible for. 
But when I told her I was a trainer……
data.processed:
󠁿I don't have an Uma Musume that I'm responsible for. 
󠁿But when I told her I was a trainer……

data.text:
Trainer……If that is a complementary 
existence……then that is what I "seek".
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿Trainer……If that is a complementary 
󠁿existence……then that is what I "seek".

data.text:
"Monitoring" of a "Campaign"…… 
No, it's something beyond that……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿"Monitoring" of a "Campaign"…… 
󠁿No, it's something beyond that……

data.text: It's not simply "Monitoring"……『???』……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: 󠁿It's not simply "Monitoring"……『???』……

data.text:
……It seemed like she was requesting something of me. 
However, she seemed unable to properly put it in to words.
data.processed:
󠁿……It seemed like she was requesting something of me. 
󠁿However, she seemed unable to properly put it in to words.

data.text:
This girl who looked like an Uma Musume, 
"Neo Universe", just what was it she wanted?
data.processed:
󠁿This girl who looked like an Uma Musume, 
󠁿"Neo Universe", just what was it she wanted?

data.text:
First, to "manifest". 
To be "perceived"……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿First, to "manifest". 
󠁿To be "perceived"……

data.text: If I can't do that, then I won't "be on track"……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: 󠁿If I can't do that, then I won't "be on track"……

data.text:
Neo Universe looked up to the sky. I looked 
up as well, wondering what was up there. When 
I tried to tell her "I don't see anything"……
data.processed:
󠁿Neo Universe looked up to the sky. I looked 
󠁿up as well, wondering what was up there. When 
󠁿I tried to tell her "I don't see anything"……

data.text:
She was……nowhere to be seen. 
As if she had disappeared in to a rift in space-time.
data.processed:
󠁿She was……nowhere to be seen. 
󠁿As if she had disappeared in to a rift in space-time.

data.text:
"Neo Universe"……had she even really existed? 
Or had I just been imagining things?
data.processed:
󠁿"Neo Universe"……had she even really existed? 
󠁿Or had I just been imagining things?

data.text:
――Several days after that. 
At a mock race.
data.processed:
󠁿――Several days after that. 
󠁿At a mock race.

data.text:
Seems like there will be a lot of 
promising girls entering today.
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
data.processed:
󠁿Seems like there will be a lot of 
󠁿promising girls entering today.

data.text:
Yeah, I'm looking forward to how the 
race will turn out. Out of all of them……
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer B
data.processed:
󠁿Yeah, I'm looking forward to how the 
󠁿race will turn out. Out of all of them……

data.text: W-who's that……?
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
data.processed: 󠁿W-who's that……?

data.text:
That girl, "Neo Universe" had suddenly 
appeared at the racetrack. And then――
data.processed:
󠁿That girl, "Neo Universe" had suddenly 
󠁿appeared at the racetrack. And then――

data.text: I'm going to……『Compete』
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: 󠁿I'm going to……『Compete』

data.text:
Neo Universe is a……"STDA" 
……so to acquire "synapses"……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿Neo Universe is a……"STDA" 
󠁿……so to acquire "synapses"……

data.text:
Everyone was stunned as she walked out on to the turf. 
And so, the mysterious girl unexpectedly entered the race.
data.processed:
󠁿Everyone was stunned as she walked out on to the turf. 
󠁿And so, the mysterious girl unexpectedly entered the race.
